body:
The mobile version should be much better now. It's not perfect yet, but I've fixed the header, most of the navigation, and some visual glitches here and there.

Fix https://github.com/monicahq/monica/issues/7393

![Screenshot 2024-10-25 at 14-04-39 - Monica](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/08999038-cfc9-43bd-b8cb-8e936a8f02bc)
